subject: how do I use my filter when running from ANT1.7
msgSnippet: I have the following class that filters request to run only those methods in Trial.class with a SRG prefix. @RunWith(Suite.class) @Suite.SuiteClasses({
messageBody:
I have the following class that filters request to run only those
methods in Trial.class with a "SRG" prefix.

@RunWith(Suite.class)
@...({
Trial.class
})
public class SRGSuite {
public static void main(String argv[]) {
JUnitCore jCore = new JUnitCore();
Request req = Request.classes("SESSuite",SRGSuite.class);
jCore.run(req.filterWith(new TestFilter("SRG")));
}
}

This works fine if I run the class directly. However, when I run it
from ANT1.7, it runs all the methods in Trial class and not just the
prefixed ones.

I understand that ANT isn't calling my main method, but then how do
I use my filter when running from ANT1.7?

I'm new to junit, pls do point out if I have missed out anything
basic.
